doc:
James Kirkwood Jr. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Kirkwood_Jr. 0 James Kirkwood Jr. (August 22, 1924 – April 21, 1989) was an American playwright, author and actor. In 1976 he received the Tony Award, the Drama Desk Award for Outstanding Book of a Musical, and the Pulitzer Prize for Drama for the Broadway hit A Chorus Line. James_Kirkwood_Jr. ( August_22_,_1924 – April_21_,_1989 ) was an_American_playwright , author_and_actor . In 1976 he received the_Tony_Award , the_Drama_Desk_Award for Outstanding_Book of a_Musical , and the_Pulitzer_Prize for Drama for the_Broadway_hit A_Chorus_Line .
